trans-unit.source: Managing Services
trans-unit.target: 管理服务

trans-unit.source: Managing Services
trans-unit.target: 管理服务

trans-unit.source: There are eight core Service cmdlets, designed for a wide range of service tasks .
trans-unit.target: 有八个专为各种服务任务设计的核心 Service cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: We will look only at listing and changing running state for services, but you can get a list Service cmdlets by using **Get\-Help \*\-Service**, and you can find information about each Service cmdlet by using **Get\-Help<Cmdlet\-Name>**, such as **Get\-Help New\-Service**.
trans-unit.target: 我们将只查看列出和更改服务的运行状态，但是你可以通过使用 **Get\-Help \*\-Service** 获取 Service cmdlet 列表，还可以使用 **Get\-Help<Cmdlet\-Name>**（例如 **Get\-Help New\-Service**）找到每个 Service cmdlet 的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Getting Services
trans-unit.target: 获取服务

trans-unit.source: You can get the services on a local or remote computer by using the **Get\-Service** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用 **Get\-Service** cmdlet 获取本地或远程计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: As with **Get\-Process**, using the **Get\-Service** command without parameters returns all services.
trans-unit.target: 与使用 **Get\-Process** 相同，使用不带参数的 **Get\-Service** 命令将返回所有服务。

trans-unit.source: You can filter by name, even using an asterisk as a wildcard:
trans-unit.target: 你可以按名称进行筛选，甚至可以使用星号作为通配符：

trans-unit.source: Because it is not always obvious what the real name for the service is, you may find you need to find services by display name.
trans-unit.target: 因为服务的真实名称并不总是可见，所以你可能会发现你需要按显示名称查找服务。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by specific name, using wildcards, or using a list of display names:
trans-unit.target: 可以按特定名称（使用通配符或使用显示名称的列表）执行此操作：

trans-unit.source: You can use the ComputerName parameter of the Get\-Service cmdlet to get the services on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 Get\-Service cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数获取远程计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: The ComputerName parameter accepts multiple values and wildcard characters, so you can get the services on multiple computers with a single command.
trans-unit.target: ComputerName 参数接受多个值和通配符，因此你可以使用单个命令获取多台计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets the services on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令获取 Server01 远程计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Getting Required and Dependent Services
trans-unit.target: 获取必需和从属服务

trans-unit.source: The Get\-Service cmdlet has two parameters that are very useful in service administration.
trans-unit.target: Get\-Service cmdlet 具有两个在服务管理中非常有用的参数。

trans-unit.source: The DependentServices parameter gets services that depend on the service.
trans-unit.target: DependentServices 参数获取依赖于该服务的服务。

trans-unit.source: The RequiredServices parameter gets services upon which this service depends.
trans-unit.target: RequiredServices 参数获取此服务所依赖的服务。

trans-unit.source: These parameters just display the values of the DependentServices and ServicesDependedOn (alias\=RequiredServices) properties of the System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController object that Get\-Service returns, but they simplify commands and make getting this information much simpler.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数只显示 Get\-Service 返回的 System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController 对象的 DependentServices 和 ServicesDependedOn (alias\=RequiredServices) 属性的值，但是它们可简化命令，使获取此信息更加简单。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the services that the LanmanWorkstation service requires.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令获取 LanmanWorkstation 服务需要的服务。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the services that require the LanmanWorkstation service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令获取需要 LanmanWorkstation 服务的服务。

trans-unit.source: You can even get all services that have dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 你甚至可以获取所有具有依赖关系的服务。

trans-unit.source: The following command does just that, and then it uses the Format\-Table cmdlet to display the Status, Name, RequiredServices and DependentServices properties of the services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令所做的就是这些，然后使用 Format\-Table cmdlet 来显示计算机上服务的 Status、Name、RequiredServices 和 DependentServices 属性。

trans-unit.source: Stopping, Starting, Suspending, and Restarting Services
trans-unit.target: 停止、启动、暂停和重启服务

trans-unit.source: The Service cmdlets all have the same general form.
trans-unit.target: 所有 Service cmdlet 都具有相同的一般形式。

trans-unit.source: Services can be specified by common name or display name, and take lists and wildcards as values.
trans-unit.target: 可以按公用名或显示名称指定服务，并使用列表和通配符作为值。

trans-unit.source: To stop the print spooler, use:
trans-unit.target: 若要停止打印后台处理程序，请使用：

trans-unit.source: To start the print spooler after it is stopped, use:
trans-unit.target: 若要在停止后启动打印后台处理程序，请使用：

trans-unit.source: To suspend the print spooler, use:
trans-unit.target: 若要暂停打印后台处理程序，请使用：

trans-unit.source: The **Restart\-Service** cmdlet works in the same manner as the other Service cmdlets, but we will show some more complex examples for it.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 **Restart\-Service** cmdlet 的操作方式与其他 Service cmdlet 的操作方式相同，但是我们将针对它列举一些更复杂的示例。

trans-unit.source: In the simplest use, you specify the name of the service:
trans-unit.target: 使用最简单的方式指定服务的名称：

trans-unit.source: You will notice that you get a repeated warning message about the Print Spooler starting up.
trans-unit.target: 你将注意到你收到了有关打印后台处理程序启动的重复警告消息。

trans-unit.source: When you perform a service operation that takes some time, Windows PowerShell will notify you that it is still attempting to perform the task.
trans-unit.target: 执行需要耗费一些时间的服务操作时，Windows PowerShell 将通知你它仍在尝试执行该任务。

trans-unit.source: If you want to restart multiple services, you can get a list of services, filter them, and then perform the restart:
trans-unit.target: 如果想要重启多个服务，则可获取服务列表，并对其进行筛选，然后执行重启操作：

trans-unit.source: These Service cmdlets do not have a ComputerName parameter, but you can run them on a remote computer by using the Invoke\-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这些 Service cmdlet 没有 ComputerName 参数，但是你可通过使用 Invoke\-Command cmdlet 在远程计算机上运行它们。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command restarts the Spooler service on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令在 Server01 远程计算机上重启后台打印程序服务。

trans-unit.source: Setting Service Properties
trans-unit.target: 设置服务属性

trans-unit.source: The Set\-Service cmdlet changes the properties of a service on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Set\-Service cmdlet 更改本地或远程计算机上服务的属性。

trans-unit.source: Because the service status is a property, you can use this cmdlet to start, stop, and suspend a service.
trans-unit.target: 因为服务状态是一种属性，所以你可以使用此 cmdlet 来启动、停止和暂停服务。

trans-unit.source: The Set\-Service cmdlet also has a StartupType parameter that lets you change the service startup type.
trans-unit.target: Set\-Service cmdlet 还有一个 StartupType 参数，可让你更改服务启动类型。

trans-unit.source: To use Set\-Service on Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, open Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista 及 Windows 的更高版本上使用 Set\-Service，请使用“以管理员身份运行”选项打开 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Set-Service [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b71e29ed-372b-4e32-a4b7-5eb6216e56c3)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Set-Service [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b71e29ed-372b-4e32-a4b7-5eb6216e56c3)

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅
